titleStmt.title: Mercy in a miracle shewing, the deliverance, and the duty, of the king, and the people In a sermon preached at Mitcham in Surry, June 28. 1660 in a solemne congratulation for the restoration of his Majesty to his royal throne. By Anthonie Sadler, late chaplain, to the right honourable Leticia, Lady Pagett, Dowager, deceased.
titleStmt.author: Sadler, Anthony, b. 1610.
Vaughan, Robert, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T.C. for L. Sadler,

notesStmt.note: With a verse on A1v and an illustration on A2r. The verse is titled: "The author on his frontispiece." and the illustration is signed: Vaughan sculp.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
